name: Global uniques
uniques: [-75]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [-1] Happiness>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
[-50]% [Production] [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
[-33]% Strength <for [All] units> <when below [-10] Happiness>
Cannot build [Settler] units <when below [-10] Happiness>
Rebel units may spawn <when below [-20] Happiness>
[-1] Sight <for [Embarked] units>
[+100]% growth [in capital] <for [City-States] Civilizations>
[+100]% [Production] <for [City-States] Civilizations>
[+100]% Strength for cities <vs [AI player] units> <for [City-States] Civilizations>
Cannot build [Settler] units <for [AI player] Civilizations> <when number of [Cities] is more than [2]> <during the [Ancient era]>
Cannot build [Settler] units <for [AI player] Civilizations> <when number of [Cities] is more than [3]> <during the [Classical era]>
Cannot build [Settler] units <for [AI player] Civilizations> <when number of [Cities] is more than [4]> <during the [Medieval era]>
Cannot build [Settler] units <for [AI player] Civilizations> <when number of [Cities] is more than [5]> <during the [Renaissance era]>
[-2] Unit Supply <for [AI player] Civilizations>
[-1] Unit Supply per city <for [AI player] Civilizations>
[-1] Unit Supply per [4] population [in all cities] <for [AI player] Civilizations>
Triggers a [Choose Your Ideology] event <upon entering the [Modern era]> <when below [1] [EventCounter001]>
Triggers a [Choose Your Ideology] event <when number of [[Factory] Buildings] is more than [2]> <when below [1] [EventCounter001]> <upon turn end>
Instantly provides [1] [Passed Era] <upon entering a new era>
